vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.withdraw (patch_5.sol#14-18) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- msg.sender.transfer(calculatedFibNumber * 1000000000000000000) (patch_5.sol#17)

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.withdraw (patch_5.sol#14-18) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	require(bool)(fibonacciLibrary.delegatecall(fibSig,withdrawalCounter)) (patch_5.sol#16)

vulnerability_findings.name: controlled-delegatecall
vulnerability_findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.fallback (patch_5.sol#20-22) uses delegatecall to a input-controlled function id
	require(bool)(fibonacciLibrary.delegatecall(msg.data)) (patch_5.sol#21)

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.calculatedFibNumber (patch_5.sol#5) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- withdraw (patch_5.sol#14-18)

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
FibonacciBalance.calculatedFibNumber should be constant (patch_5.sol#5)
FibonacciBalance.start should be constant (patch_5.sol#6)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function setFibonacci(uint n) public {
        calculatedFibNumber = fibonacci(n);

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in FibonacciBalance.withdraw (patch_5.sol#14-18):
	-require(bool)(fibonacciLibrary.delegatecall(fibSig,withdrawalCounter)) patch_5.sol#16

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in FibonacciBalance.fallback (patch_5.sol#20-22):
	-require(bool)(fibonacciLibrary.delegatecall(msg.data)) patch_5.sol#21

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_fibonacciLibrary' of FibonacciBalance. (patch_5.sol#10) is not in mixedCase

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_start' of FibonacciLib.setStart (patch_5.sol#29) is not in mixedCase
